NORTH ATLANTIC.
6.5 METER S/V, RED AND BLACK HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 13-42N 037-40W AT 261725Z JAN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 39 065 908 4793.
